subject: Basketball
Officiating (Sports)
Federal District Courts
lead_paragraph: Federal prosecutors tacitly vouched for the credibility and candor of Tim Donaghy, the disgraced former N.B.A. referee, in a letter filed in federal court last month.
snippet: Federal prosecutors tacitly vouched for the credibility and candor of Tim Donaghy, the disgraced former N.B.A. referee, in a letter filed in federal court last month.
